com.orgsync.api

Interface CoursesResource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoursesResourceImpl

    public interface CoursesResource

    Access to the courses resource from the OrgSync API. This allows a client to get all courses and do basic CRUD operations.

    See: https://api.orgsync.com/api/docs/v2/courses

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get all of courses for this community.

      • getCourseEntries

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Course>>> getCourseEntries()
        Get all of courses for this community.
        Returns:

        Create a new course entry.
        Parameters:

        Update a single course entry.
        Parameters:
